title: Leifield Batting Partial back run for sale

posts.post_title: Leifield Batting Partial back run for sale
posts.post_content:
T206 Lefty Leifield Batting partial back run - American Beauty $315; Sovereign 350 $250; Sweet Cap 350 F30 $45 (SOLD); Piedmont 350F25 $40.  cards have issues as seen in photos, but coupla tough backs.  PP FF preferred.  PM for more details/pix offers.   thanks!  Cliff
